verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G2222>life<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>,
longing <S%G1971><s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G3415>remembering<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%>;

having <S%G2983>been<s%> <S%G5280>reminded<s%> of the <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> that <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>; <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1774>dwelt<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3125>grandmother<s%> <S%G3090>Lois<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2131>Eunice<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%>, I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%>, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

For <S%G1223>which<s%> cause I <S%G363>put<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> in <S%G363>remembrance<s%> that thou stir <S%G329>up<s%> the <S%G5486>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G156>hands<s%>.

Be <S%G1870><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> ashamed <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1870>of<s%> the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3366>nor<s%> of <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> suffer <S%G4777>hardship<s%> with the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

who <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> us with a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, which was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G166>times<s%> <S%G5550>eternal<s%>,

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5319>hath<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> been <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, who <S%G2673>abolished<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5461>brought<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G861>immortality<s%> to <S%G5461>light<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>,

For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> cause <S%G3958>I<s%> suffer <S%G2532>also<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>: <S%G235>yet<s%> I <S%G1870>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> him <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G4100>believed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G5442>guard<s%> that <S%G3866>which<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> have <S%G3866>committed<s%> unto him <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G156>day<s%>.

Hold <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G5296>pattern<s%> of <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

That <S%G3588><s%> good <S%G2570>thing<s%> which was committed unto <S%G3872>thee<s%> <S%G5442>guard<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> which <S%G1774>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>.

This <S%G5124><s%> thou <S%G1492>knowest<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> turned away <S%G654>from<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>; of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5436>Phygelus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2061>Hermogenes<s%>.

(the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>grant<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>); <S%G2532>and<s%> in how many <S%G3745>things<s%> he <S%G1247>ministered<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> very <S%G957>well<s%>.
